android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

com.android.launcher.permission.UNINSTAL.description: Don't use this permission in your app. This permission is no longer supported.

android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.description: Allows the application to control the flashlight.

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows an application to show system-alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the entire screen of the phone.

android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.description: Allows an application to kill background processes of other applications, even if memory is not low.

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.description: Allows an application to disable the key lock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of this is the phone disabling the key lock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enabling the key lock when the call is finished.

android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.description: Allows the modification of collected battery statistics. Not for use by common applications.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. playstore_details.title: Video Maker of Photos with Music & Video Editor
playstore_details.description:
FILMIGO Video Maker is the easiest video editing tool and slideshow maker to make stylish video, photo and vlog. Provide Valentine's Day material! With minimum operations, a spark video combined with popular themes, special subtitles and hot music will be shown. 

Key Features of this movie creator/photo editor
📌 Professional Editing Tool:
FILMIGO video trimmer offers the best tools for you to quick reverse/rotate/trim/split/ duplicate your clips and cut movie. You can cut video in parts, merge images from your gallery or album, compress video without losing quality like a professional video producer, zoom in/speed up/speed down the video to make a super interesting piece of art.

📌 Monotonous Themes:
FILMIGO video creator have various free themes and unique transition. It only takes one tap to create an awesome music video or ideal slideshow instantly. Video Maker & Video Editor makes it easy for you to grab attention and gain more followers and likes on social media by editing your photos and clips into eye catching video.

📌 Various Music:
Video Maker offers fully licensed music and after effects to make your video fun and popular. Pick all the trendy music you like and make impressive video. 

📌 Cute Stickers: 
There’re various GIF, emoji, creative sticker. Our facial recognition makes you look fantastic in any video/slideshow/vlog. The FX options and animated stickers are also fun. FILMIGO Movie Maker makes it very easy for users to edit video and slideshow.

📌 Artistic Subtitles:
There’re variety of text styles and fonts for you to choose in this intro maker/video cutter. We also provide powerful video editing function to make funny and creative original videos. In the meantime, our vip privilege includes hd export and unique functions, there's also no ads or watermark. 

📌 Export: 
FILMIGO video editor provides 720P/1080P HD export with no quality loss and no duration limit. You can save the video or slideshow to your draft or album at any time. Besides blurred background and voice enhancement features makes the video and slideshow more appealing.

📌 Share: 
Square themes and no crop mode are customized for Instagram users. Easily sharing your videos to Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Flipagram, Vivavideo. Record your special moments like wedding, Valentine's Day, Halloween, Christmas, Birthday...

With this movie editor/slideshow maker, creating a video with photos, music, and other elements is easy and fun. You can beautify your videos with subtitles, themes,transition,stickers and almost anything you want in a creative and personalized way. 

Video Maker, Video Editor with Photos & Music will always be updating for all users!
playstore_details.summary: FILMIGO Video Maker with Effects, Best Video Cutter for Vlog, Free Video Editor
playstore_details.summaryHTML: FILMIGO Video Maker with Effects, Best Video Cutter for Vlog, Free Video Editor
playstore_details.developer: VideoShow EnjoyMobi Video Editor & Video Maker Inc

VideoShow Video Editor Video Maker & Filmigo Movie Maker Video Cutter
playstore_details.recentChanges:
1. Add the feature of gradient colors of subtitles. 
2. Fine-tune video speed.
3. Support editing large videos.
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML:
1. Add the feature of gradient colors of subtitles.
2. Fine-tune video speed.
3. Support editing large videos.
